Package machinelearningproject

Class CSVReader

java.lang.Object
machinelearningproject.CSVReader
public class CSVReader extends Object
This is a class which extends FileReader, and implements a constructor and overrides an abstract method.
Since:
13/03/2022

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected String
    fileName
    The name of the file which will be used by methods within the program to create a file object and return the content of the file
    protected File
    fileObject
    The file object which will be created by the class.
    protected Scanner
    fileScanner
    A scanner object which will be used to read text from the file object.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    CSVReader(String fileName)
    This is the constructor used to initialise the file with its name.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    protected void
    closeScanner()
    This method is used to turn of the scanner once the file's contents have been read.

    createFileObj()
    This method is used to create a file object to be read by the FileReader.
    String
    getFileName()
    This method is used to get the name of the file

    This method is used the whole file into a string variable.
    String
    readLine()
    This method is used to read a single line from the file.
    void
    resetScanner()
    This method is used to turn on a new scanner and have it go back to the first line.
    void
    setFileName(String filename)
    This method is used to set the filename and verify the file extension.

  • Method Details

    • setFileName

      public void setFileName(String filename)

      This method is used to set the filename and verify the file extension.

      Parameters:
      filename - name of the file

    • createFileObj

      protected void createFileObj()

      This method is used to create a file object to be read by the FileReader.

    • readLine

      public String readLine()

      This method is used to read a single line from the file.

      Returns:
      the next line in the file or null if there isn't one

    • readFile

      public String readFile()

      This method is used the whole file into a string variable.

      Returns:
      the contents of the file as a single string.

    • closeScanner

      protected void closeScanner()

      This method is used to turn of the scanner once the file's contents have been read.

    • resetScanner

      public void resetScanner()

      This method is used to turn on a new scanner and have it go back to the first line.

    • getFileName

      public String getFileName()

      This method is used to get the name of the file

      Returns:
      the name of the file.
